com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.provider

Class DynamicAppWidgetProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.BroadcastReceiver
      • android.appwidget.AppWidgetProvider
        • com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.provider.DynamicAppWidgetProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DynamicLocale

    public abstract class DynamicAppWidgetProvider
extends android.appwidget.AppWidgetProvider
implements DynamicLocale
    A customisable app widget provider to provide basic configuration functionality.

    Extend it and modify according to the need.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • getRemoteViews

        protected abstract android.widget.RemoteViews getRemoteViews(android.content.Context context)
        Override this method to get a RemoteViews fo this widget provider.

        It can be according to the widget height and width to provide dynamic layouts.

        Parameters:
        context - The context associated with this widget provider.
        Returns:
        The remote views for this provider.

      • updateAppWidget

        public void updateAppWidget(android.content.Context context,
                            android.appwidget.AppWidgetManager appWidgetManager,
                            int appWidgetId)
        Override this method to update a widget instance according to the id.

        It will be useful while implementing a configuration activity via DynamicWidgetActivity.

        Parameters:
        context - The context associated with this widget provider.
        appWidgetManager - The app widget manager.
        appWidgetId - The app widget id to be updated.
